job_tasks.phrase: leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions to bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of building solutions, with an emphasis on using AI to achieve this, aligning with integrating AI into product development.

job_tasks.phrase: Dive into developing innovative features that integrate people and systems seamlessly, setting new standards in connectivity and communication.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of features and integration into existing systems, a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize your expertise in data and analytics to craft unique user experiences, optimize advocate activities, and foster a vibrant, interactive community that drives brand loyalty and engagement.
job_tasks.justification: This involves crafting user experiences and optimizing activities, which are software development tasks, even though it mentions data and analytics.

job_tasks.phrase: Your role is pivotal in offering actionable insights and a holistic customer view that propels customer satisfaction and loyalty to new heights.
job_tasks.justification: While 'actionable insights' can lean towards data analysis, the context of providing a 'holistic customer view' within a CRM solution points to software development for feature enhancement.

job_tasks.phrase: navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines, offering unique opportunities to innovate.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the integration of AI solutions into product lines, a key software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Your expertise will guide the development of scalable, serverless applications and innovative features, leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of software development tasks, focusing on scalability, serverless architecture, and cloud-native technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
job_tasks.justification: This describes using AI tools to enhance core software development activities like coding, debugging, and feature development.

job_tasks.phrase: Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on modernizing product lines through AI-driven innovations, which is an application of software engineering principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
job_tasks.justification: This is a clear description of backend software development and deployment using specific technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.
job_tasks.justification: Code reviews and ensuring best practices are fundamental software engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions enhancing functionality and integrating AI solutions, which falls under software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly indicates collaboration with a global team.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights collaboration as a means to ensure quality and standards.

soft_skills.phrase: eager to leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions
soft_skills.justification: The phrase 'eager to leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions' suggests a proactive and innovative approach to problem-solving.
This directly points to an innovative aspect of the role.

soft_skills.phrase: innovative features, leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies.
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the development of innovative features.
This phrase indicates a focus on innovation driven by AI.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as developing, integrating, and deploying applications, features, and back-end solutions. While AI is mentioned as a tool to enhance these processes and is integrated into the product lines, the core responsibilities and the majority of the coded phrases fall under Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering). There are no explicit tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG (Macro-Category B). Therefore, the role is best classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, where AI is a component of the software being built rather than the primary focus of model creation or specialization.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the nature of the role, focusing on software engineering tasks enhanced by AI. The distinction between using AI tools and developing AI models is well-defined by the listed responsibilities. The tasks clearly align with the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.
